name: Abnormal Quest - Word Connect
description:
NOTICE: Hi. Support my game. Install via Google Play link, play and write a comment, this will help in improving the game and creating new content. Thanks!


«Abnormal Quest - Word Connect» is an adventure puzzle game in which our mission is to connect words and save the princess. Need to connect words as quickly as possible, otherwise the ending will be unpredictable. The main weapon on the way to overcoming obstacles will be - word!



We’re going to travel to the medieval where, by connecting words, we’re going to communicate with characters of varying degrees of adequacy that come our way. Some of our words will have to be repeated in a conversation more than once due to hearing problems or the natural cunning of our interlocutors. Our words will have a positive effect on someone, and some words can will be angry.

Also in our adventure game need to connect words not only for communication, but also for finding the items needed to complete the mission. We will gain some with the help of the word, some, because of the word, we will lose, and somewhere by connecting the words we will repair the object we need.

Connect words as fast as possible, set new records in the game and prove to yourself or a friend that you are the fastest word connector and princess rescuer in the Worl … in the game. You can quickly connect words, and get the main game record - «Best Time». Connect the words carefully and add to the record «Best Time», best score - least number of words spent. Or, when connecting words, use fewer hints, this will also be will affect the record for the better.

As in any adventure game, we have a helper who has a lot of words in stock. If it will be difficult and the word does not connect, and the time remains less and less, then you can always call Ginny. This erudite will always give a hint to connect the words correctly.

«Abnormal Quest - Word Connect» adventure game, has its own rules. There are not many of them, but it is recommended to follow them in order to connect the words correctly and succeed in the adventure:

1) The word is the main resource. If you to connect the words thoughtlessly, they will soon run out. In a word, everything that consists of more than three letters will be considered.

2) Time. The sooner the adventure is over, the more, nice the final will be. That's all you need to know about time.

 

World is not limited in one word and one world!
Connect the words and Have Fun!
